page.title: 03J. SAINSBURY, PRENTON
page.content: J.Sainsbury's store is situated on Woodchurch Road in Prenton. It was opened in March 1982. Many{products}are sold, such as fresh and cooked meats, canned foods, fruit and vegetables, frozen foods, packet foods, beverages, etc. Altogether there are 7000 different lines. There are 300{employees,}some full time and others working part time. The ratio of female to male staff is 4:1. Shoppers are mostly local people, but before the opening of the Chester store, customers would travel from as far afield as{North Wales.}Since the store opened, it has been very successful. In fact it is a{'Group A' store. In one week 27% of the customers shop at Sainsbury's on a Friday, and Monday is the quietest day.
